remarks: The value of the trace of a lattice translation, given any atom ` P ` not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` .  Note: this requires only the weaker assumption ` K e. Lat ` ; we use ` K e. HL ` for convenience. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
trlval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlval2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trlval2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
trlval2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlval2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlval2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlval2.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlval2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( R ` F ) = ( ( P .\/ ( F ` P ) ) ./\ W ) ) $.
